mapper.sql: SELECT s.stack_id, s.workplace_id, w.company_id, c.company_name, w.workplace_name, s.stack_name, s.prevention, s.reg_date, s.note from stack `s` INNER JOIN workplace `w` ON w.workplace_id = s.workplace_id INNER JOIN company `c` ON c.company_id = w.company_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stack (workplace_id, stack_name, prevention, reg_date, note) VALUES (#{workplace_id}, #{stack_name}, #{prevention}, #{reg_date}, #{note})
